Package com.j2igf.framework.graphics.auxiliary

package com.j2igf.framework.graphics.auxiliary
This package contains the auxiliary classes that are used by the graphics package of J2IGF.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.j2igf.framework.graphics
    This package contains the classes and sub-packages that deal with graphics of J2IGF.
    com.j2igf.framework.graphics.visual
    This package contains the classes that deal with the visuals of J2IGF.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Animator
    This class is responsible for handling animation states.
    FontAtlas
    This class is used to create a font atlas for a given font.
    SpriteSheet
    A class that represents a Sprite sheet.
